newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures close mixed, relief after FOMC.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures close mixed, relief after FOMC.

text.p: Aug 20 - U.S. debt futures closed mixed, as traders expressed relief the FOMC did not raise U.S. interest rates after Tuesday's meeting. However, Sept T-bonds fell to a session low of 110-23/32 after one U.S. firm sold 7,000 contracts after the FOMC announcement. Most Euros ended near the day's highs. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
